divs: Sighting Details1 I WAS SITTING ON THE EDGE OF MY BED USING MY LAPTOP AROUND MIDNIGHT WHERE I CAN SEE OUT OF MY WINDOW. THE SECOND TIME I SAW IT I COULD FEEL APAIN IN MY NECK WHERE THERE IS NOW A SMALL KNOT. 2 I SAW SOME WEIRD LIGHTS THROUGH THE WINDOW 3 WELL A STOP LIGHT ON IT SIDE IT HOVERED 4 WAS WONDERING WHAT IT WAS 5 IT DIAPERED EVERY TIME THERE WAS A BEAM OF LIGHT SHININH INTO A BRAND NEW HIGH SCHOOL BEING BUILT
